a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Hours of work vs. GDP per capita, 1870 to 2000
Hours of work are weekly hours of full-time production workers in non-agricultural activities. GDP per capita is
adjusted for inflation and price differences across countries.
Data source: Huberman & Minns (2007), Maddison Project Database 2020 (Bolt and van Zanden (2020))
